description.en: Decred aims to build a community-directed digital currency whose security, adaptability, and sustainability make it a superior long-term store of value. It is achieving this aim by building the world's first truly decentralized autonomous organization.

description.ko: 디크레드는 비트코인과 유사하지만 공동체 입력, 개방 통치, 지속 가능한 자금 조달과 개발에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 소규모 그룹이 공동체의 흐름을 지배하거나 배제할 수 없도록 하기 위해 "proof-of-work"와 "proof-of-stake" 채굴 시스템을 활용합니다. 통화의 무결성을 보장하고 사람들이 부정 거래를 하거나 자신의 동전을 만드는 것을 방지하기 위해, 블록체인이라고 알려진 거래 방법을 사용합니다.

status_updates.description:
It's happening!

Decred v1.6.3 is here, now with an initial #DCRDEX integration right into our GUI wallet Decrediton.

Users will be able to enjoy an experience that allows for non-custodial exchange of assets, and no trading fees.

https://decred.org/release/

April Decred Journal is out!

Check out the detailed report on development, network and social stats, ecosystem growth and new media content.

https://xaur.github.io/decred-news/journal/202104

We're ready to test Decred's new decentralized Treasury on mainnet. A small draft spend of 0.1 DCR will be published tomorrow, and sent back to the treasury if it is approved and mined.

If you use the command line tools to solo vote please set your preference in the following manner:

dcrctl --wallet settreasurypolicy "03f6e7041f1cf51ee10e0a01cd2b0385ce3cd9debaabb2296f7e9dee9329da946c" "yes or no"

For details see: https://www.reddit.com/r/decred/comments/n9hm7u

We're very excited to announce that Decred's decentralized treasury is now live.
The proposal was voted on, funded, and activated via stakeholder voting.
It will now make stakeholders the sole custodians of Decred's Treasury.

https://dcrdata.decred.org/treasury

PSA: Logins have been disabled on https://proposals.decred.org while it is being upgraded. Normal activity is expected to resume on Monday Apr 19.

This upgrade gives Politeia a new storage backend, a proper plugin architecture and streamlined APIs. All of that together allows to scale Politeia in terms of both capacity and use cases.
https://twitter.com/lukebp_/status/1376259489704337408

The tech behind it is explained here:
https://github.com/decred/politeia/pull/1180

The March issue of Decred Journal is out now!

Highlights this time around include the approval of the treasury decentralizing DCP-0006 upgrade, release of v1.6.2, migration of Politeia to a new back-end, and growing affection for bison in the community.

https://medium.com/decred/decred-journal-march-2021-fe6ec072f09c

Decred Address Scanner is now on F-Droid! The app can notify of balance changes for any of the tracked addresses.
https://f-droid.org/en/packages/com.decred.decredaddressscanner/

APK is also available on GitHub:
https://github.com/decred/dcraddrscanner/releases

And for those still on Google:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.joegruff.decredaddressscanner

In late 2020 a proposal was approved to fund the needed updates:
https://proposals.decred.org/proposals/3943bff
